# AI Context Directory

This directory contains curated documentation for AI coding agents.

## Purpose
Help AI agents understand the current state of the project without getting confused by old documentation.

## Files
- `CURRENT_DOCS.md` - Links to current documentation
- `PROJECT_STRUCTURE.md` - Project organization overview
- `ACTIVE_TASKS.md` - Current development focus

**Note:** This directory is auto-generated by Smart Documentation Agent
